    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2986) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Class" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=397" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 206 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98)

**Prerequisites**
elemental magic

</column>

---

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165). You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the elementalist archetype.

<title level="2">Elementalist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Burning Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2989), [Dousing Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2987), [Elemental Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=2988), [Metabolize Element](/Feats.aspx?ID=2990), [Redirect Elements](/Feats.aspx?ID=2992), [Rockslide Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2991), [Wind-Tossed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2993)
name: Elementalist Dedication
